name: Diona
storytext: Dedicating 1% of her energy to mixing drinks, and 99% to... refusing to accept failure.
source: Reward for inviting Diona to a duel at The Cat's Tail and claiming victory in a Friendly Fracas with her

skills.name: Icy Paws
skills.description: Deals 2 Cryo DMG, creates 1 Cat-Claw Shield.

skills.name: Signature Mix
skills.descriptionraw: Deals $[D__KEY__DAMAGE] $[D__KEY__ELEMENT], heals this character for 2 HP, summons 1 <color=#FFFFFFFF>$[C111023]</color>.
skills.descriptionreplaced: Deals 1 {SPRITE_PRESET#2101}<color=#99FFFFFF>Cryo DMG</color>, heals this character for 2 HP, summons 1 <color=#FFFFFFFF>Drunken Mist</color>.
skills.description: Deals 1 Cryo DMG, heals this character for 2 HP, summons 1 Drunken Mist.
